content: I used macros 2.0's decl_macro for simd_swizzle! to resolve some weird compilation issues and make our macro now have a namespace. It seems painless enough, with just a minute adjustment to syntax. Should we use this going forward for internal macros as well?
Also I am not proposing rewriting all the macros we have rn, it just is something I "broke the seal" on and seems actually pretty commonly used in rustc so might as well launch it as an idea.
i think public macros should use this, but internals it doesnt matter
